title: Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts: Filene Center Activities
body: Filene Center Activities       The 7,000 seat Filene Center is the centerpiece of the activity at Wolf Trap. Performances are offered from mid May through mid September. Before a performance at the Filene Center, there are lots of opportunities for recreation throughout the park.  Â            Performance And Ticket Information   Find out what shows are coming soon and how to get your ticket.        Pre-Performance Discussion Series   Join a discussion to gain special insight into the evening's performance on select nights.              Concessions And Picnicing   There are options to bring your own picnic or visit concessions during performances.        Take A Hike!   Winding through the woods and over Wolf Trap Run to explore the park's natural areas on the Wolf Trap Trail or TRACK Trail.
